subject: Re: {Spam?} RE: newbee: junit 4.1 tests fail
msgSnippet: Hello Kent, ... OK, thanks for the answer. So there is no need to worry, unless I actually use these kind of tests. Patrick
messageBody:
Hello Kent,

> There is already a defect on SourceForge for this. It works on Windows, but
> not on Linux or OS X. If I start a VM on those OSes and the child VM invokes
> System.exit(n), then the parent VM doesn't necessarily get n back when it
> calls waitFor() on the Process.

OK, thanks for the answer. So there is no need to worry, unless I
actually use these kind of tests.

Patrick
